Question: Hemargroup CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Hemargroup

Product: Electronic Manufacturing Services (EMS)

- Swiss-made EMS partner providing engineering, prototyping, mass production, and end-to-end lifecycle management
- Specializes in supporting startups and global corporations with comprehensive, reliable solutions
- Highlights ability to accelerate time-to-market and manage complete lifecycle of electronic products
- Represents Swiss precision and innovation in electronic manufacturing
- Offers wide range of services including engineering development, prototyping, mass production, final testing, assembly, and advanced 3D printing capabilities
Summary_cn:
Hemargroup

产品：电子制造服务（EMS）

- 瑞士制造的EMS合作伙伴，提供工程、原型制造、大规模生产和端到端的生命周期管理
- 专注于为初创企业和全球公司提供全面可靠的解决方案
- 强调加速上市时间和管理电子产品的完整生命周期的能力
- 代表瑞士的精密和创新在电子制造业的应用
- 提供包括工程开发、原型制造、大规模生产、最终测试、装配和先进的3D打印能力在内的广泛服务范围
